statements: DELETE FROM event_registrations WHERE attendee_id = 100 AND registration_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM event_registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2021-11-01' AND attendee_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE id = 10 AND first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM event_sessions WHERE session_id = 5 AND location = 'Conference Hall' AND session_date = '2022-01-20';
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE attendee_id = 2 AND first_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM registrations WHERE event_id = 1 AND registration_date < TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE price > 1000 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
